about_the_game:
This is a collection of BGM tracks and songs from the game Idol Magical Girl Chiru Chiru Michiru Part 1 & 2.
The tracks are available in both MP3 and WAV (high-quality) format.

BGM Production:
Track 1-7, 10-15 : U
Track 8, 9 : Pixelbee

---------------------------------------

MAJICK（Track 16, 17）(Opening Theme)

Vocals: Hana
Composition & Arrangement: Hitoshi Fujima (Elements Garden)
Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima

All Programming & Other Instruments: Hitoshi Fujima

Mixed by Hisayoshi Kondo
Directed by Hitoshi Fujima
Recorded at ARIA studio
Sound Produced by Elements Garden
Production Management: Asami Suita (ARIA entertainment)

---------------------------------------

Love me DO!!（Track 18, 19）(Ending Theme)

Vocals: Chata
Back Chorus：Chata＆U
Composition & Arrangement: U
Lyrics: U

---------------------------------------

KISS YOU（Track 20,21）(Insert song/Last Ending Theme)

Vocals: Hana
Composition & Arrangement: U
Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima

---------------------------------------

KISS YOU　-Duet ver-（Track 22, 23）(Insert song/Last Ending Theme)

Vocals: Hana＆Chata
Composition & Arrangement: U
Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima

---------------------------------------


WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
MP3:192kbps

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8.1/10
  • Storage: 86 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 630 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
